comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/artolog] Re: Notes (on photo)
Art,
This was one of those photos where the more I stared at it, the less it looked like anything I could recognize!  The highlights and shadows played tricks with me, as well as what you identified as Mrs. Astor's lapel !  Thanks for making the obvious -- obvious to me!

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: It is strange looking.  I had to download the hi-res version to be sure.
